'''"One-Eyed" Croft''' is a high-ranking member of the [[Second Sons (mercenary company)|Second Sons]]. He appears in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Croft apparently was involved in a job with [[Asher Forrester]], and afterwards the two didn't part on the best of terms.

After the Second Sons were pledged to [[Daenerys Targaryen]], Croft went with them to [[Meereen]] following the [[Battle of Yunkai]].

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
Needing to hire an army of sellswords in order to fight back against [[House Whitehill]], Asher suggests Croft, reasoning that Croft owes him a favor. [[Beskha]] responds that Croft probably hates Asher after their last job, but Asher promises to bring Croft to their side.
